description:
"Modern Family" fans, hopefully you enjoyed Rob Riggle's guest appearances last season because ABC is considering a spinoff revolving around his character.《摩登家庭》的粉丝们，希望你们喜欢Rob Ringgle在上一季的表现，因为ABC电视台正在考虑是否要预定该剧衍生剧，衍生剧将会以Rob Ringgle为主角。

Deadline reports that ABC and 20th Century Fox TV, which produces "Modern Family," are working on a turning their hit comedy into a franchise. They're reportedly mulling over several ideas, as the project is in very early stages, but one concept that is being explored would be built around Riggle's Gil Thorpe, who he played in two episodes in Season 4.Deadline网站报道，《摩登家庭》制作方ABC电视台、福克斯电视制作公司正准备制作这部衍生剧。目前正处于制作早期，他们已经有了多个想法，故事将会围绕上季终出现了两集的Riggle扮演的Gil Thorpe展开。

The project is being led by "Modern Family" co-executive producers Paul Corrigan and Brad Walsh, who would write the script. Do you think a "Modern Family" spinoff with Rob Riggle would be a good idea? 这部衍生剧的制作由《摩登家庭》执行制片人Paul Corrigan和编剧Brad Walsh牵头。大家怎么看Rob Riggle主演的这部《摩登家庭》衍生剧？

title: 《摩登家庭》也要出衍生剧
